name: nirc
description: As a side project i want to create a [IRC](http://nl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internet_Relay_Chat) client as webapp.  Im going to use [Ember](emberjs.com) for the frontend. To start with a bit of styling [Bootstrap](http://getbootstrap.com/).  The server part will be written in NodeJS. The communication between the front -and backend will be through sockets.
author: Rolf Koenders <rolfkoenders@gmail.com> (http://rolfkoenders.nl/)
